title: Gold Coast Studio - all utilities included
app_fee: $30 application fee includes full background check
posting_body: True studio apartment, all utilities included (heat/AC, water, electric) - you only pay for cable/internet.
Perfect for one person!
Southern facing windows provide ample natural light.
Walk-through closet and a coat closet provide in-unit storage.
Additional storage locker in the basement included.
Clean, light, airy.
Move in and make it your own!
Only 1 mile to Edgewater Park, 1.5 miles to Lakewood Park.
10 minutes to downtown, 17 minutes to CLE Hopkins airport, 20 minutes to Cleveland Clinic main campus.
Building amenities include:
- Secure entry via an electronic FOB key
- Front desk open until 8 pm
- In-building laundry
- Roof-top deck for beautiful spring/summer/fall evenings.
Great place to watch fireworks and the air show.
- Outdoor pool
- Exercise room
Neighborhood conveniences:
- walking distance to 24-hr CVS, Lucky's Market grocery store, Chipotle, Dinerbar, Landmark Smokehouse, etc., vintage shops, Anytime Fitness and Starbucks
- RTA bus stops outside the building
- New restaurants and storefronts opening on the corner of W. 117th and Clifton.
